title: What's cooking?
creator_credit: Damian Brown, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Presents a humorous look at the health problems which abound in the unhygienic kitchen and shows how to overcome these through following sanitary procedures. The film covers proper refridgeration of food, observation of shelf life of food products, how to recognise blown cans and the need to avoid using the same utensils for cooked and uncooked food. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
